attributes.action: Lift 14 day quarantine when returning to U.K. from  spain
attributes.additional_details: Lift the quarantine because Spain had done everything in there power to contain the Covid 19 pandemic by lockdown early and  social distancing, wearing facmasks everywhere and separation squares on beaches. The Spanish government cannot do any more than there doing and Covid 19 is not going anywhere worldwide until we find a vaccine. Temperature checks and offering Covid 19 testing at the persons expense should be an alternative to quarantine. Most people cannot afford to quarantine and take the time off work .
attributes.background: Lift the 14 day quarantine on return to U.K. from Spain to save the U.K. and Spanish tourists industry and aviation industry
